venue.name: Blackstone River Valley Bikeway @ The Blackstone River State Park

item.description: Hi  All, Just updating this meetup, the weather looks pretty good for the ride Sunday, so this meetup is ON!! People who want to can meet at 830am to ride 10-15 miles before we all meetup  at 10am. My tel# 508 525 2719 if your lost, but I live in Boston area, so many of you will know this area better than myself, I've ridden this twice, so I know the parking lot of the road where the 2 low signs are telling you it's Blackstone Park. A lot of people have signed up which is awesomw, but PLEASE, get there at least 30 minutes early if you have to air your bike,tighten things or whatnot. I look forward to meeting you all on Sunday. I drive a yellow Ford Escape,and don't sweat anything just come for a nice ride!
item.name: Bike Ride Blackstone River 20 miles Round Trip
